responsibilities: Build data-intensive products, working with data and features.
Help build the foundational Machine Learning (ML) infrastructure for the platform.
Design, implement, and integrate the next generation of Machine Learning infrastructure.
Collaborate with engineers and data scientists to create optimal experiences on the Core ML platform.
Build, debug, and maintain highly available distributed systems.
qualifications: Deep understanding of machine learning concepts and applications.
Strong programming skills in Python, Golang, or Kotlin.
Strong collaboration and communication skills, both verbal and written.
Ability to succeed in a dynamic startup environment.
Passion for Nextdoor’s mission and purpose.
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building data-intensive products, creating machine learning infrastructure, and collaborating with engineers and data scientists. The skills required include a deep understanding of machine learning concepts, strong programming skills, and effective communication. While the job involves machine learning and data science, there is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The focus seems to be on building infrastructure and systems for machine learning rather than specifically working with GenAI or LLMs.
